q_en: What are the orders for PolyU?
gt:
Sure! Here are the orders for the customer named "PolyU":

| Order Name       |
|------------------|
| PolyU_Tshirt     |
| PolyU_Skirt      |
| Order for PolyU  |

Looks like PolyU has some stylish choices! 😄 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT order_name FROM orders WHERE user_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the orders for the customer with the name "PolyU"
